entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Carlyle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:24 PM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023
